{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:403

header.#text:
Amendment to the Federal
			 Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act regarding genetically engineered
			 salmon

text.#text:
If it contains genetically engineered fish
				unless the food bears a label stating that
				fact.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to
		  require labeling of genetically engineered fish.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions
